title: RA RA BOOM
description: Grab your pom-poms and gear up for 4-player co-op action with a modern twist! Ra Ra BOOM rockets you to a future Earth overrun by rogue AI. Battle waves of enemies and upgrade your ninja cheerleader’s skills as you beat ‘em up, shoot ‘em up, and smash through the chaos!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Don't bring pom poms to the boss fight.
<!--text-->
Gear up for 4-player co-op action with a modern twist! Ra Ra BOOM rockets you to a future Earth overrun by rogue AI. Battle waves of enemies and upgrade your ninja cheerleader’s skills as you beat ‘em up, shoot ‘em up, and smash through the chaos!

Even ninja space cheerleaders know you don’t bring a pom-pom to a boss fight. Whether you’re cracking skulls with close combat or blasting bots from across the screen, Ra Ra BOOM has your back. Play it like a classic side-scroller, treat it like a shooter, or mix it up for combos so smooth, even evil AI can’t keep up. The only wrong way to fight is not bringing your A-game—because these overlords don’t mess around.

<!--image-->
![Ra Ra BOOM-170nv](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/f8e1f184a5264855b2f4f240701c1331/ra-ra-boom-170nv.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Who needs perfect grades when rogue AI is trashing Earth? The planet’s in pieces, robots are running wild, and only four ninja space cheerleaders have the moves to save it. Silly when it can be, heartfelt when it needs to be, Ra Ra BOOM delivers a beat ‘em up with a story that hits harder than your math final.

<!--image-->
![Ra Ra BOOM-f17q6](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/f8e1f184a5264855b2f4f240701c1331/ra-ra-boom-f17q6.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Why settle for chaos when you can dominate with precision? Ra Ra BOOM’s combat lanes make every fight smarter and slicker. Dodge fire like a pro, pick your targets with ninja-like accuracy, and decide where to strike for maximum impact.

<!--image-->
![Ra Ra BOOM-1ag3j](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/f8e1f184a5264855b2f4f240701c1331/ra-ra-boom-1ag3j.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Aris, Saida, Ren, and Vee are more than just pompoms and sass—they’ve got branching skill trees that let you mold them into your perfect hero. Customize your squad to fit your playstyle, because the fate of the world—and your team’s vibe—is in your hands. NBD.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Key Features
<!--text-->
- **4-Player co-op chaos **– Team up locally with friends and family for a throwback experience.
- **Beat ‘em up meets shoot ‘em up** – Switch between melee and ranged combat instantly. Chain combos and special moves for maximum impact.
- **A narrative adventure **– Fully voiced story with an original soundtrack.
- **Lane-based fighting** – Master movement and on-the-fly strategy in every battle as you dodge and target across multiple lanes.
- **Choose from four unique characters** - Pick the playstyle that suits you with each character offering a fresh way to play
- **Upgrade to the ultimate hero** - Choose your skills to match your playstyle.
- **Play nine unique levels** - From swamps and sewers to sprawling amusements parks
- **Stylish, Hand-Drawn Art **– A vibrant comic/anime-inspired world.
